mapper.select: select o.id, c.name as c_name, u.name as u_name, o.description, o.creation_date, o.state, o.modify_date from offers as o join categories as c on o.category = c.name join users as u on o.name = u.name order by o.modify_date desc

select o.id, c.name as c_name, u.name as u_name, o.description, o.creation_date, o.state, o.modify_date from offers as o join categories as c on o.category = c.name join users as u on o.name = u.name where o.state = 'Activo' or o.state = 'En proceso' order by o.modify_date desc

select o.id, c.name as c_name, u.name as u_name, o.description, o.creation_date, o.state, o.modify_date from offers as o join categories as c on o.category = c.name join users as u on o.name = u.name where u.name = #{Name} order by modify_date desc

select o.id, c.name as c_name, u.name as u_name, o.description, o.creation_date, o.state, o.modify_date from offers o join users u on u.name = o.name join categories c on c.name = o.category order by o.state
mapper.insert: insert into offers(id, category, name, description, creation_date, state, modify_date) values (nextval('id_Offers'), #{Cat}, #{Name}, #{Desc}, current_date, #{State}, current_date)
mapper.update: update offers set state = #{State}, modify_date = current_date where id = #{Id}
